00017 from nevow                  import appserver
00018 from nevow                  import loaders
00019 from nevow                  import rend
00020 from nevow                  import static

00025 from formless               import webform

00029 ##
00030 #    @ingroup submit
00031 #
00032 class ConfirmationPage(rend.Page):
00033     """
00034     Renders confirmation page.
00035     
00036     Handles the confirmation page of a successful evaluation upload.
00037     Return to root page or submit another evaluation are suggested.
00038     """
00039     head = [ T.title ["QSOS evaluation Upload"] ]
00040     body = [ T.h1 [ "Your evaluation has been uploaded" ] ,
00041              T.a ( href = "../" ) [ "Go to Repository Main Page" ],
00042              " or ",
00043              T.a ( href = "../submit" ) [ "Upload another evaluation" ]
00044             ]
00045     docFactory = loaders.stan( T.html[ T.head [ head ], T.body [ body ] ] )
00046     
00047 
00048 ##
00049 #    @ingroup submit
00050 #
00051 class UploadPage(rend.Page):
00052     """
00053     Handles upload page.
00054     
00055     This class renders the main page of submit branch of the site.
00056     
00057     """
00058     
00059     
00060     docFactory = loaders.xmlstr("""
00061 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"
00062            "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
00063 <html xmlns:n="http://nevow.com/ns/nevow/0.1">
00064     <head>
00065         <title>Example 1: A News Item Editor</title>
00066     </head>
00067     <body>
00068         <h1>Example 1: A News Item Editor</h1>
00069         <n:invisible n:render="fileUploader" />
00070     </body>
00071 </html>
00072 """)
00073     
00074 
00075 
00076     def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
00077         super(UploadPage, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
00078     
00079     def submitEvaluation(self, **formData):
00080         "Put the uploaded evaluation into the local repository"
00081         qsos = formData["File"].file.read()
00082         qsos = "".join([line.strip() for line in (qsos.splitlines())]) 
00083         splitter.parse(qsos,"..")
00084         return url.here.click('submit/confirmation')
00085 
00086     def bind_submitEvaluation(self, ctx):
00087         "Bind the proper action to perform when submit action is invoked"
00088         return [
00089             ('File', annotate.FileUpload(required=True)),
00090         ]
00091 
00092     def render_fileUploader(self, ctx, data):
00093         "Renders the file uploader form"
00094         return ctx.tag.clear()[
00095             webform.renderForms()
00096         ]
00097     
00098     children = {'confirmation'  : ConfirmationPage()}
